heading: Donimo Drivers
description: is a puzzle I designed where dice can walk over the dominoes or drive them around. (1 player, 4 dice, and double-six dominoes)

heading: Adding Donimoes
description: is a puzzle I designed where you add dominoes in the given order. (1 player, double-six dominoes)

heading: Khufu
description: is a trick-taking game, inspired by David Parlett's card game, 99. (2-3 players, double-six dominoes)

heading: Tetromino Road
description: is a board game I designed where you lay out dominoes with roads between them. (2 players, double-six dominoes, beads and coins)

heading: Writing Rules
description: is a section to help me remember how to create the different types of diagrams.
